column5: Need a place to stay for a few days or holidays, weekends, and/or extended stay? We have a beautiful home in a new neighborhood only a few minutes from Oasis, Joe Pool Lake Marina, Lynn Creek Park and Cedar Hill State Park. The bedroom is furnished with luxurious aloe gel memory foam bed that you will sleep so comfortably in. There are two twin beds and room could be shared or you can have the whole room to yourself. Antique barn door adds character to the space. Bathroom is right outside.
column8: Cozy Suite near Joe Pool Lake
